# Notes on how to use Jekyll Theme - Minimal Mistakes

## Mailto

- [Mailto text](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22765834/insert-a-line-break-in-mailto-body)

## Front-end

- [Center table](https://www.w3schools.com/howto/howto_css_table_center.asp)
- [Horizontally align table](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38293514/how-to-horizontally-center-table-inside-div)
- [Can't align table due to template styles](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8986260/how-to-center-the-contents-of-an-html-table)
- [Creating a grid](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48665316/how-to-create-a-css-grid-with-3-columns-and-unlimited-amount-of-items)

## Deploy to GH Pages

- [Move all project files to `repository` and change url route to `/` in `config.yml`](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15217357/deploying-jekyll-to-github-pages)
